On 11/01/08, 15:38:04, wjr wrote regarding
[Radiance-general] New installation :


Hello Bill,


> I'm an architect in Chicago, Il and I'm running ARRIS ( an
> architectural CAD program ) on a Sun Microsystems Ultra-45 and
> Solaris 10. I have to say that it runs extremely well. I now have
> the capability to do 3D modelling the way I always wanted to. And
> now I want to render my models on the SUN. It is difficult to find
> rendering software to run on this platform ( other than Blender)
> And sometimes it's difficult to install.  That's where I am with
> Radiance.  I'm having difficulty installing Radiance on the Sun.
> Can you help me out? I've downloaded the files, unzipped them and
> tried to run "makeall" as it described in the "Readme" file. But it
> will not run. I've tried just 'clicking' on the icon, (nothing),
> I've tried opening a shell and command-line, (nothing), I've tried
> both ways as 'user' and 'root' (nothing).  What am I missing?


http://www.blastwave.org/packages.php/radiance






James.
